ticket.title: Micro optimization for build_named_route_call in PolymorphicRoute
ticket.original-body:
Micro optimization for build_named_route_call in PolymorphicRoutes:
1. use map instead of inject 2. use [].join("_") instead of '<<'. It is a little bit faster for ruby 1.9.2 and x2 faster for ruby 1.8.7. http://gist.github.com/548143
